author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-5683: SendProcessor should not use a soft cache as we want the producer to be kept around, as we only store a single producer. This prevents the producer to be GC when running low on memory, that can cause Camel JMS component using temporary queues with request/reply to create new producer, and not re-use existing. Causing a leak for message listeners over time.

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-5937: File handle is leaked when a Slave replication is shutdown with failover=true
Recovery should close current log file before opening a new one.

author: alexparvulescu
msg: OAK-362 Unify all the existing index implementations under one package

author: cschneider
msg: KARAF-1897 Changing HTTP port in regression tests

author: brett
msg: [CONTINUUM-2688] '.' should be allowed in goals to specify a group ID
